install.name: Simple Image Rotator
install.author: JoomlaWorks
install.copyright: This extension in released under the GNU/GPL License - http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable). This allows individual module styling.

param.name: imagefolder
param.label: Image Folder path
param.description: Set here the path to the folder containing the images to be displayed. The module will scan this folder and display images automatically!

param.name: display
param.label: Display order
param.description: Should the images display in sequence or randomly?

param.name: transition
param.label: Rotation speed
param.description: Set here the rotation speed (in 1/100th seconds) between images. 100 means 1 second.

param.name: delay
param.label: Rotation timeout
param.description: Set here the rotation timeout (in miliseconds) for every image. 1000 means 1 second.

param.name: width
param.label: Image (header) width
param.description: Set here the target width of all images in pixels.

param.name: height
param.label: Image (header) height
param.description: Set here the target width of all images in pixels.

param.name: forceresize
param.label: Force image resize (if wider)
param.description: Should we force all images exceeding the given width above to resize, using CSS?.

param.name: enablelink
param.label: Enable link to images?
param.description: Should the images have a universal link pointing to a single URL? If you choose no, then the next parameter is disabled, obviously!

param.name: link
param.label: Link to URL
param.description: Insert here a link to a URL that users will be redirected to when they click on the 'Simple Image Rotator'. Enter '#' (without the quotes) for same page.

param.name: target
param.label: Where should the above link open?
param.description: Choose whether the 'master' link will open in a new or in the same window.

param.name: linktitle
param.label: Link title
param.description: Insert here the link title which will be shown to the visitor when they hover their mouse ver the images. Do not use single or double quotes or the HTML will break.

param.name: darkbg
param.label: Display 'loading icon' for...
param.description: Display different loading icon per template color scheme, white or dark.

param.name: useforbanners
param.label: Should the Rotator be used to display banners from the Banner Component?
param.description: This option will retrieve all published banners and display them.

param.name: bannerfolder
param.label: Banner folder
param.description: Leave as is if you haven't changed the default banners location.
